id.description: The ARN of the Kinesis Analytics Application.

kinesisFirehose.description:
The Kinesis Firehose configuration for the destination stream. Conflicts with `kinesis_stream`.
See Kinesis Firehose below for more details.

kinesisStream.description:
The Kinesis Stream configuration for the destination stream. Conflicts with `kinesis_firehose`.
See Kinesis Stream below for more details.

lambda.description: The Lambda function destination. See Lambda below for more details.

name.description: The Name of the in-application stream.

schema.description: The Schema format of the data written to the destination. See Destination Schema below for more details.
